TID_START_TEXT:
👋 Hi, {name}!
I’ll help you with the Brawl Stars files!
💠 Through me you can get a lot of useful information from the game and its sites!

⌨ Just send me the file to get started or use the keyboard I sent you!
❗ The bot is still in development!
TID_WORK_TEXT: {name}, choose the right command for this file:
TID_WORK_FILENOTEXIST: {name}, you need to attach a file to the command!
TID_WORK_DOWNLOADFAIL: {name}, failed to download the file! Perhaps it weighs too much...
TID_WORK_FORMATSNOTEXIST: {name}, this file cannot be converted to any of the available formats!
TID_COMPRESSED_PHOTOS_TEXT: Compressed photos found. To discover more functionality, send photos as documents!
TID_SOME_FILES_CONVERTED: {name}, not all files have been converted!
TID_CHOOSE_AUDIO_CONVERT: {name}, you can download audio in compressed or uncompressed form
TID_ARCHIVEISRENAMED: VK does not allow downloading audio in archives. Before unpacking the archive, erase the number 1 at the end!
TID_FILE_LOADED_VIA_USERAPI: The file is loaded this way, as it exceeds 200MB
TID_FILES_LOADED_VIA_USERAPI: Files are uploaded this way because one of them exceeds 200MB
TID_TOO_MANY_FILES:
You sent too many files ({files_count})
The maximum number of files: {maximum_count}
TID_VK_FIRST_COMMAND:
Hi, {name}!
I’ll help you with the Brawl Stars files!
 Through me you can get a lot of useful information from the game and its sites!

⌨ Just send me the file to get started or use the keyboard I sent you!

You can get a list of all commands by writing "Commands". Get more information about commands and bot usage here: [типа статья ы]
❗ The bot is still in development!
TID_VK_COMMANDS:
/commands -- list of commands
/version -- game version information
/download [filename] -- download game file
	You can write several files separated by commas!
/about -- info about the game from  Play Market/App Store
/profile -- your profile

/commands to work with your profile:
/nick <nick> -- change your nick in profile to <nick>
/bind <TG id> -- Bind this account to TG
TID_DOWNLOAD_FILES_WITHOUT_ARGS:
{name}, you should write a file to download. For example:
/download skins.csv

You also can download several files. Just write it separating by commas! For example:
/download skins.csv, crow_geo.glb, fingerprint.json

You can use "get" instead "download":
/get loading.sc, loading_tex.sc
TID_CHANGE_NICK_WITHOUT_ARGS:
{name}, you should enter a new nickname. For example:
/nick Birdy
TID_DOWNLOADFILES_TEXT:
{name}, could find {files_count} file(s) from {game_version} version:{files_name}

You can download the archive with these files by clicking on the button at the bottom.
TID_DOWNLOADFILES_FILES:
{name}, could find {files_count} file(s) from {game_version} version.

The search results were uploaded to a file.
TID_DOWNLOADFILES_NOTFOUND:
{name}, file(s) not found(-s)!
Try changing the search query or game version!
TID_DOWNLOADFILES_QUERYMISSING:
{name}, no search query found!
You can search for regular expressions if you want!
TID_DOWNLOAD_FILES_WITHIN_LIMIT: {name}, you can only download {limit} files at a same time! The first {limit} files will be downloaded (from {files_count)
